Class SettingsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.settings.server.resources.SettingsResource

public class SettingsResource
extends java.lang.Object
    API for handling Settings and their associated information.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        @GET
@Produces("application/vnd.api+json")
@PermitAll
public net.explorviz.shared.querying.QueryResult<Setting> getAll​(@Context
                                                                 javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
        Endpoint to access all settings.
        Returns:
        all settings currently available.

      • getById

        @GET
@Produces("application/vnd.api+json")
@Path("{id}")
@PermitAll
public Setting getById​(@PathParam("id")
                       java.lang.String id)
        Endpoint to access a single setting.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the setting
        Returns:
        the setting with HTTP 200 (OK)
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.NotFoundException - if there is no setting with the given id

      • deleteById

        @DELETE
@Produces("application/vnd.api+json")
@Path("{id}")
@RolesAllowed("admin")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteById​(@PathParam("id")
                                            java.lang.String id)
        Endpoint to delete a single setting.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the setting
        Returns:
        returns a HTTP Status 201 (No Content).

      • createSetting

        @POST
@Consumes("application/vnd.api+json")
@RolesAllowed("admin")
public Setting createSetting​(Setting s)
        Endpoint for creation of new settings.
        Parameters:
        s - a setting more specific a subtype of Setting. @return Returns HTTP 200 (OK) on success
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.BadRequestException - if the setting is malformed and could not be saved
